name.text: ICoLearn - Internet and collaborative based learning methodologies toolbox for digital transformation and sustainable growth |<b> Project No.: 101127224

accordion.t1: Year of Foundation: Founded in 1960 as a federal university through the merger of several higher education institutions in Niterói and nearby areas.
accordion.t2: Location: The main campus is in Niterói, with academic units in other cities in the state of Rio de Janeiro, such as Volta Redonda, Campos dos Goytacazes and Nova Friburgo.
accordion.t3: Ranking: It is one of the main public universities in Brazil, recognized for its excellence and academic research projects.

members.title: MEMBERS
members.modal2-i: Product Engineering, Product Development and Quality Management. Currently my area of research interest is techniques used in prototyping laboratories, where I practice additive printing, product design, laser cutting, among other techniques. I have worked on projects in the areas of assistive technology and products aimed at family agricultural producers.
members.modal2-f: School of Engineering, Department of Production Engineering Universidade Federal Fluminense
members.modal3-i: Quality management, Project Management, Supply chain management.

members.modal5-i: Ergonomics, Human Factors, Health and Safety at Work, Anthropometrics
